WWWOFFLE - World Wide Web Offline Explorer

WWWOFFLE Proxy Authorisation Failed

Access to the WWWOFFLE Proxy is controlled, user authentication is required.

Help

The WWWOFFLE program has been configured to require user authentication for all proxy requests. This requires a browser capable of processing HTTP/1.1 requests and a valid username and pasword for the proxy.
